name: visio-meet
description: Meet is a self-hosted video meeting platform using WebRTC. It provides rooms, screensharing, and chat in a browser-based interface for secure, private conferencing.
features: Video conferencing: Host video meetings with multiple participants using WebRTC technology.
Screen sharing: Share your screen with meeting participants for presentations and collaboration.
Chat messaging: Send text messages during meetings for questions and side conversations.
Browser-based: Join meetings directly from web browsers without installing software.
Meeting rooms: Create persistent or temporary meeting rooms with custom URLs.
Privacy-focused: Host meetings on your own infrastructure without third-party data access.
No registration: Allow participants to join meetings without creating accounts.
Mobile support: Join meetings from mobile devices with responsive web interface.
Recording: Record meetings for later review or sharing with absent participants.
Participant management: Control who can join meetings and manage participant permissions.
Quality settings: Adjust video and audio quality based on bandwidth availability.
Secure connections: Use encrypted connections for private and secure video conferencing.
